recipes.description: A picaresque account of a journey through nightmare, interspersed with what might be partial rites. 'On the eighteenth Ascent is the bud. On the thirty-third Ascent, the blossom.'

recipes.startdescription: The Seventh Mark is the Conflagration of the Heart. I am close: close as the flame is to the candle. I will need all the power of the Forge I can muster, to at least the thirty-third degree of intensity.
The Seventh Mark is the Feast of the True Birth. I am close: close as blood to the heart. I will need all the power of the Grail I can muster, to at least the thirty-third degree of intensity.
The Seventh Mark is the Incursus. I am close: close as the light to the shadow's edge. I will need all the power of the Lantern I can muster, to at least the thirty-third degree of intensity.
